hero.heading: Safe & Reliable Towage Services
hero.description: Celebrating over 19 years of excellence in harbour towage and workboat services throughout the WhangƒÅrei area.

about.heading: About Kaipara Towboats LTD
about.paragraph1: Kaipara Towboats is a family-owned business established in 2007, providing harbour towage and workboat services within the WhangƒÅrei area.
about.paragraph2: The company has expanded its fleet of tugs and barges with increasing demand, as well as the area of operations. Since its formation, the company has established a reputation as a reliable, safe quality towage operator.
about.paragraph3: With a good track record and high levels of skill, coupled with an honest can-do attitude, Kaipara Towboats maintains its fleet of vessels to a high standard, available 24/7.

services.name: Harbour Towage
services.description: Professional towing services for vessels of all sizes within the WhangƒÅrei area and surrounding waters.

services.name: Barge Services
services.description: Barge-based access and positioning for bridge works, marine construction, maintenance, and specialised operations.

services.name: 24/7 Availability
services.description: Round-the-clock service ensuring your maritime operations never stop, with emergency response available.

services.name: Marine Support Service
services.description: Comprehensive tug and marine support services, including harbour towage, vessel escorting, project cargo movements, deadship towage, ship berthing, coastal towage, dredging support, lines boats duties, crew, diver and pilot transfers, salvaging, and general port and coastal marine services.
